headline: Dividend Hike And Buyback Plan Might Change The Case For Investing In Carrier Global (CARR)
summary: Carrier Global’s board recently approved a higher quarterly dividend of US$0.24 per share, payable on February 9, 2026, to shareholders of record on January 20, 2026, underscoring its ongoing cash returns policy. The company’s decision to lift its dividend, alongside a multi‑billion‑dollar share buyback plan, highlights management’s confidence despite softer residential HVAC conditions. We’ll now examine how the higher dividend and large share repurchase authorization influence Carrier...
